body_html: Yeah, I think that's exactly what we need. I'm not sure how to get the indices correctly. You might need to view that max tensor as a 1D vector and compute "flattened indices". Then, you can use .put_.
body_text: Yeah, I think that's exactly what we need. I'm not sure how to get the indices correctly. You might need to view that max tensor as a 1D vector and compute "flattened indices". Then, you can use .put_.
body: Yeah, I think that's exactly what we need. I'm not sure how to get the indices correctly. You might need to view that max tensor as a 1D vector and compute "flattened indices". Then, you can use `.put_`.
